header.label: Header
header.comment:
IMPORTANT:
Width of the header columns is specified in grid units.
If you want to display three columns (Left Column, Central Column, Right Column) in a single row,
sum of these columns has to be equal 12 grid units, for example:
4 + 4 + 4, or 4 + 0 + 8, or 3 + 0 + 9, or 0 + 12 + 0.

left_column.label: Left Column
left_column.comment:
Specify value in grid units (between 2 and 12).
Important: Leave empty to remove this column.

central_column.label: Central Column
central_column.comment:
Specify value in grid units (between 2 and 12).
Important: Leave empty to remove this column.

right_column.label: Right Column
right_column.comment:
Specify value in grid units (between 2 and 12).
Important: Leave empty to remove this column.

signup.label: "Sign Up" Link
signup.comment: If enabled, "Sign Up" link will be displayed next to the "Log In" link.

toplinks_break_position.label: Position of Additional Line Break
toplinks_break_position.comment: E.g. add a line break after the cart drop-down to force other elements of the User Menu to be displayed in the new line (below the cart). Note that elements of the User Menu are aligned to the right edge of the header and are rendered in the following order: cart drop-down, "Compare" block, Top Links, custom static block.

cart_label.label: Show Text Label "Cart"
cart_label.comment: If set to "No", label "Cart" will be hidden in the Mini Cart drop-down block in the header. Note that in order to display Mini Cart drop-down block, option "Display Shopping Cart Sidebar" under System > Configuration > Checkout > Shopping Cart Sidebar has to be enabled.

compare.label: Display Mini Compare in Header
compare.comment: Enable/disable Mini Compare drop-down block in the header. If disabled, the block will be displayed on its default position in Magento (in the left sidebar).

compare_label.label: Show Text Label "Compare"
compare_label.comment: If set to "No", label "Compare" will be hidden in the Mini Compare drop-down block in the header.

sticky.label: Sticky Header
sticky.comment: If enabled, the main menu does not disappear when the user scrolls down the page.

sticky_full_width.label: Full Width Sticky Header
sticky_full_width.comment: If set to "Yes", content of the sticky header will be stretched to full width.

sticky_logo.label: Show Logo in Sticky Header
sticky_logo.comment: If set to "Yes", additional logo image will be displayed in the sticky header. Refer to the documentation for more details about the logo image.

mobile_move_switchers.label: Move Switchers Next To Logo
mobile_move_switchers.comment: If set to "Yes", language and currency switchers will be moved next to the logo (but only on small mobile devices - when browser viewport is narrower than 770 pixels) to make the header smaller.

mode.label: Mobile Header (deprecated)
mode.comment:
Important: this option is deprecated and will be removed in next updates.
It transforms the standard header into a mobile-friendly header on small mobile devices (if browser viewport is narrower than 770 pixels).
Note 1: if enabled, position of blocks can't be set to "Inside User Menu" or "Inside Main Menu".
Note 2: if enabled, option System > Configuration > Menu > Main Menu Mode has to be set to Drop-down/Mobile or Mobile.

aspect_ratio.label: Keep Image Aspect Ratio
aspect_ratio.comment: Set "Yes", to keep aspect ratio of the product image (height of the image will be calculated automatically based on width). If set to "No", Magento will automatically transform each image into square. If the original image was rectangular, the empty space at the sides will be filled with white color.

image_width.label: Image Width
image_width.comment:
Width of the product image. If width is not specified, default width will be used (295 pixels). Remember that in the category view the visual size of the product image depends on the number of columns. For example, if you increase the number of columns, columns will be narrower so there will be less space for product image in each column.
Important: in Magento 1.9.1.0 (or later) enter exactly the same value in the "Small Image Width" field which can be found under
System > Catalog > Product Image.

alt_image.label: Alternative Image
alt_image.comment: Show alternative image on mouse hover over the product image.

alt_image_column.label: Select Alternative Image By Column
alt_image_column.comment: Which column of the product image gallery will mark alternative images of your products.

alt_image_column_value.label: Alternative Image Column Value
alt_image_column_value.comment: Specify the value which will mark alternative images of your products. E.g.: if Select Alt. Image By Column is set to "Sort Order", specify the number which will mark (in "Sort Order" column of the product image gallery) alternative images, for example: "2".

column_count.label: Number of Columns
column_count.comment:
Number of products displayed in a single row, if the value of Maximum Page Width is set to 1024 px.
Important: if the value of Maximum Page Width is bigger, the number of columns will be automatically increased to show more products in a row. For example: if the Number of Columns = 3 and the Maximum Page Width = 1280 px, then 4 products in a row will be displayed.

column_count_768.label: Number of Columns Below 768px
column_count_768.comment: Number of columns displayed if browser viewport width is between 640 px and 768 px.

column_count_640.label: Number of Columns Below 640px
column_count_640.comment: Number of columns displayed if browser viewport width is between 480px and 640 px.

column_count_480.label: Number of Columns Below 480px
column_count_480.comment: Number of columns displayed if browser viewport width is between 320 px and 480 px. Below that width products are displayed in a single column.

equal_height.label: Equal Height of Grid Items (Products)
equal_height.comment: If enabled, all grid items have the same height and "Add to cart" button is displayed at the bottom edge of the item.

hover_effect.label: Product Hover Effect
hover_effect.comment:
Emphasize the product on mouse hover over the product.
Important: enable in order to use "Display On Hover" in Display Selected Elements. Otherwise displaying elements on mouse hover over the product will not work properly.

disable_hover_effect.label: Disable Hover Effect Below...
disable_hover_effect.comment: Product Hover Effect will be disabled if width of the browser viewport is below selected value.

hide_addto_links.label: Hide "Add to" Links Below...
hide_addto_links.comment: "Add to wishlist" and "Add to compare" links will be hidden if width of the browser viewport is below selected value.

centered.label: Align Center
centered.comment: Align center elements of the grid item: product name, price, button etc.

elements_size.label: Size of Elements
elements_size.comment: Control size of the elements of the grid item: product name, button, product labels. If "Default" is selected, size of the elements will be automatically decreased if width of the browser viewport is below 768px.

display_name_single_line.label: Display Name in Single Line
display_name_single_line.comment: If set to "Yes": if product name is too long to be displayed in a single line, it will be clipped and an ellipsis ('…', U+2026 HORIZONTAL ELLIPSIS) will be appended at the end of the line to represent clipped text. This will only take effect if the field Name is set to "Display".

display_addtolinks.label: "Add to" Links
display_addtolinks.comment: "Add to wishlist" and "Add to compare" links.

addtolinks_simple.label: Show "Add to" Links as Icons Above the Image
addtolinks_simple.comment: If set to "No", "Add to wishlist" and "Add to compare" links will be displayed as text links. Otherwise, links will be displayed as simple icons above the product image.

hover_effect.label: Product Hover Effect
hover_effect.comment: Effect is visible on mouse hover over the product.

addtolinks_simple.label: Show "Add to" Links as Text Links
addtolinks_simple.comment: If set to "No", "Add to wishlist" and "Add to compare" links will be displayed as text links with icons.

product_page.label: Product Page
product_page.comment:
IMPORTANT:
Width of the product page columns is specified in grid units.
If you want to display three main columns (Image Column, Primary Column, Secondary Column) in a single row,
sum of these three columns has to be equal 12 grid units (for example: 4 + 5 + 3).

image_column.label: Image Column Width
image_column.comment: Specify value in grid units (between 2 and 12).

primary_column.label: Primary Column Width
primary_column.comment: Specify value in grid units (between 2 and 12).

secondary_column.label: Secondary Column Width
secondary_column.comment:
Specify value in grid units (between 2 and 12).
Important: Leave empty to remove this column.

lower_primary_column.label: Lower Primary Column Width
lower_primary_column.comment: Specify value in grid units (between 2 and 12).

lower_secondary_column.label: Lower Secondary Column Width
lower_secondary_column.comment:
Specify value in grid units (between 2 and 12).
Important: Leave empty to remove this column.

container2_column.label: Product Options Secondary Container Width
container2_column.comment:
Specify value in grid units (between 2 and 12).
Container for product options. Product options will be displayed in it if the "Display Product Options In" field was set to "Block after Info Column"
in product's configuration (under Catalog > Manage Products). It's recommended to specify the same width as in the "Lower Primary Column Width" field.

heading_collaterals.label: Collateral Data
heading_collaterals.comment: Container for product collateral data (displayed as tabs, accordion or stacked blocks).

tabs.label: Display Collateral Data as Tabs
tabs.comment: Display Collateral Data as tabs or accordion. If set to "No", Collateral Data will be displayed as stacked blocks.

tabs_mode.label: Mode
tabs_mode.comment:
- Tabs - display Collateral Data in tabs
- Tabs/Accordion - display Collateral Data in tabs which turn into accordion if browser viewport is narrower than the width specified in the "Accordion Threshold" field.
- Accordion - display Collateral Data in accordion

tabs_threshold.label: Accordion Threshold
tabs_threshold.comment: If option "Mode" was set to "Tabs/Accordion", tabs will turn into accordion if browser viewport is narrower than the width specified in this field. Enter value in pixels.

tabs_collapsed.label: Accordion Initially Collapsed
tabs_collapsed.comment: If set to "Yes", accordion will be collapsed.

tabs_style.label: Small Size
tabs_style.comment: Display small tabs/accordion. Useful when Collateral Data is displayed in a narrow section of the product page.

heading_separator1.label: Collateral Data - Selected Blocks
heading_separator1.comment: Select blocks which will be displayed in the Collateral Data container.

collateral_reviews.label: Reviews in Collateral Data
collateral_reviews.comment: Display product reviews in Collateral Data container.

collateral_tags.label: Tags in Collateral Data
collateral_tags.comment: Display product tags in Collateral Data container.

collateral_related.label: Related Products in Collateral Data
collateral_related.comment: Display related products in Collateral Data container.

collateral_upsell.label: Up-sell Products in Collateral Data
collateral_upsell.comment: Display up-sell products in Collateral Data container.

related_position.label: Position
related_position.comment: Position of related products block. Position will be ignored if option "Related Products in Collateral Data" was set to "Yes".

related_count.label: Number of Visible Products
related_count.comment: Number of related products displayed in each slide.

related_breakpoints.label: Breakpoints
related_breakpoints.comment:
With this parameter you can specify the number of products in a row visible with a particular browser viewport width. Use the following format (this is the default value):
[0, 1], [320, 2], [480, 3], [768, 1]
More details about this parameter can be found in the user guide.
Leave empty to use the default value.

related_timeout.label: Timeout
related_timeout.comment: To enable automatic scrolling of the slider, specify time (in milliseconds) between transitions. Leave empty to disable automatic scrolling. Note that 1000 miliseconds = 1 second.

replace_related.label: Replace Related Products With Static Block
replace_related.comment:
Deprecated. This option will be removed.
Related Products can be replaced with static block. To replace Related Products, first create a static block with ID block_product_replace_related.
Important: this feature will be ignored if option "Related Products in Collateral Data" was set to "Yes".

upsell_position.label: Position
upsell_position.comment: Position of up-sell products block. Position will be ignored if option "Up-sell Products in Collateral Data" was set to "Yes".

upsell_breakpoints.label: Breakpoints
upsell_breakpoints.comment:
With this parameter you can specify the number of products in a row visible with a particular browser viewport width. Use the following format (this is the default value):
[0, 1], [320, 2], [480, 3], [992, 4], [1200, 5]
More details about this parameter can be found in the user guide.
Leave empty to use the default value.

upsell_timeout.label: Timeout
upsell_timeout.comment: To enable automatic scrolling of the slider, specify time (in milliseconds) between transitions. Leave empty to disable automatic scrolling. Note that 1000 miliseconds = 1 second.

replace_upsell.label: Replace Up-sell Products With Static Block
replace_upsell.comment:
Deprecated. This option will be removed.
Up-sell Products can be replaced with static block. To replace Up-sell Products, first create a static block with ID block_product_replace_upsell.
Important: this feature will be ignored if option "Up-sell Products in Collateral Data" was set to "Yes".

product_slider.label: Product Sliders
product_slider.comment: This section is related to all existing product sliders. "Timeout" will be applied only to Featured Products Slider and New Products Slider. "Timeout" for Related Products and Up-Sell Products (blocks on product page) can be set in Product Page tab.

timeout.label: Timeout
timeout.comment: To enable automatic scrolling of the sliders, specify time (in milliseconds) between slide transitions. Leave empty to disable automatic scrolling. Note that 1000 miliseconds = 1 second.

speed.label: Speed
speed.comment: Duration (in milliseconds) of scrolling animation. Applied to scrolling with arrows (and touch swipe).

auto_speed.label: Automatic Scrolling Speed
auto_speed.comment: Duration (in milliseconds) of scrolling animation. Applied to automatic scrolling (if Timeout was specified) and to scrolling with pagination.

pause.label: Pause on Hover
pause.comment: If enabled, when the slider is mouseovered then the automatic scrolling will pause.

lazy.label: Lazy Loading
lazy.comment: Delays loading of images. If enabled, images outside of viewport will not be loaded before user scrolls to them.

magento_blocks.label: Default Magento Blocks
magento_blocks.comment: In this section you can disable default Magento blocks.

top_links.label: Top Links
top_links.comment: Links in the header: Accoun, Wishlist, Log In etc.

footer_links.label: Footer Links
footer_links.comment: Links in the footer: Site Map, Orders and Returns, Contact Us etc.

sidebar_blocks_home.label: Disable Sidebar Blocks (On Home Page)
sidebar_blocks_home.comment: In this section you can disable blocks which are displayed in sidebars. These setting only affect the home page.

custom_css.label: Load Custom CSS
custom_css.comment: Enable this option to load "custom.css" file in which you can override the default styling of the theme. To create "custom.css" you can use the file "SAMPLE.custom.css" which is located in skin/frontend/ultimo/default/css directory.

install.label: Data Import
install.comment:
IMPORTANT:
in case you need the original content of some static blocks or pages
XML files with all static blocks and pages can be found in the following directory:
app/code/local/Infortis/Ultimo/etc/import/

heading_buttons.label: Theme Configuration Import/Export
heading_buttons.sublabel: Click to go to the import/export page

import_blocks.label: Static Blocks
import_blocks.comment: Click this button to create all static blocks provided with this theme.

overwrite_blocks.label: Overwrite Existing Blocks
overwrite_blocks.comment: If set to "Yes", imported blocks will overwrite existing blocks with the same identifiers (if any blocks with the same identifiers already exist). To change value of this field, save the configuration (without saving, the option will remain unchanged after you refresh the page).

import_pages.label: Pages
import_pages.comment: Click this button to create CMS pages provided with this theme.

overwrite_pages.label: Overwrite Existing Pages
overwrite_pages.comment: If set to "Yes", imported pages will overwrite existing pages with the same identifiers (if any pages with the same identifiers already exist). To change value of this field, save the configuration (without saving, the option will remain unchanged after you refresh the page).

bootstrap_grid.label: Grid System
bootstrap_grid.comment: Enable the grid system from Bootstrap (version 3.3.7).

colors.label: Colors
colors.comment: In this tab, you can configure basic colors. Settings from this tab are inherited by all the other sections. Some of the settings (such as text color) can be overridden in other sections.

button_active_bg_color.label: Button Active Background Color
button_active_bg_color.comment: Selected emphasized buttons, e.g. "Add to cart" on product page, "Proceed to checkout" etc.

button_active_color.label: Button Active Text Color
button_active_color.comment: Selected emphasized buttons, e.g. "Add to cart" on product page, "Proceed to checkout" etc.

heading_tool_icons.label: Interface Icons
heading_tool_icons.comment: Selected interface icons, e.g.: slider arrows, category view toolbar icons.

additional_bg_color.label: Additional Background Color
additional_bg_color.comment: Background color used to emphasize some elements and blocks, e.g. totals on the cart page

font_size.label: Basic Font Size
font_size.comment: Size of the regular text. Font size of most of the other elements will be calculated relative to this value.

primary_font_family_group.label: Heading Font Family
primary_font_family_group.comment: Select predefined font stack, Google Fonts or type in your custom font stack.

primary_font_family_custom.label: Custom
primary_font_family_custom.comment:
Type in your custom font stack, e.g.:
Arial, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, sans-serif.
Important: Do not add trailing semicolon.

primary_font_family.label: Google Fonts
primary_font_family.comment:
Font preview is available on Google Web Fonts
Important: most of the fonts from Google are not available in all weights. Make sure that you specified correct weight (field Font Weight below) for selected font. Otherwise font will not be displayed. Refer to Google Web Fonts to check if the selected weight is available for your font.

primary_char_subset.label: Character Sets
primary_char_subset.comment:
Some of the fonts support multiple scripts (like Latin and Cyrillic for example). You need to select at least one character set.
Important: not all fonts support extended character sets. For a complete list of available fonts and font subsets refer to Google Web Fonts.
Important: using multiple character sets affects performance, so only select the character sets that you actually need.

primary_font_weight.label: Font Weight
primary_font_weight.comment:
Specify the weight of the font. You can only use numeric font weights which are available for the CSS property font-weight. E.g. normal weight is 400, bold is 700. Leave empty to use default weight.
Important: if you selected a font from Google Fonts, note that some fonts are not available in all weights. Refer to Google Web Fonts to check if the selected weight is available for your font.

shadow.label: Content Area Shadow
shadow.comment: If enabled, all sections with nontransparent Inner Background Color, will drop shadow.

shadow_nav.label: Main Menu Shadow
shadow_nav.comment: Select which container of the menu will drop shadow. Important: unlike other sections, menu doesn't need to have Inner Background Color to drop shadow.

structural_elements_transition.label: Structural Elements Transition
structural_elements_transition.comment: If enabled, main structural elements of the page layout will be animated during web browser window resizing.

viewport_bg_color.label: Viewport Background Color
viewport_bg_color.comment: Background color of the web browser viewport (applied for HTML body element). Set the same color as for footer background to avoid blank space below the footer on large screens.

bg_color.label: Page Background Color
bg_color.comment: Background color applied for all sections of the page: header, main content area and footer

content_padding_side.label: Side Padding
content_padding_side.comment: Add padding to the left and right side of inner container of all sections of the page. Leave empty to use default value. Specify value in pixels.

header.label: Header
header.comment: In this tab, you can configure the header section of the page located at the very top.

padding_top.label: Top Padding
padding_top.comment: Specify additional gap above the header section. Value in pixels.

padding_bottom.label: Bottom Padding
padding_bottom.comment: Specify additional gap below the header section. Value in pixels.

search_max_width.label: Maximum Width
search_max_width.comment:
Use to decrease the maximum width of the search box. It works similar to CSS property max-width. Example values: 200px, 75%, 10em. Leave empty to use the default width.
Important: don't forget to specify the unit.

cart_counter_color.label: Product Counter Color
cart_counter_color.comment: Small box showing number of products added to the cart.

line_height.label: Line Height
line_height.comment: Minimum height of line of text. It works similar to CSS property line-height.

padding_top.label: Top Padding
padding_top.comment: Specify additional gap above this section of the header. Value in pixels.

padding_bottom.label: Bottom Padding
padding_bottom.comment: Specify additional gap below this section of the header. Value in pixels.

content_padding_top.label: Top Padding
content_padding_top.tooltip: Specify additional space at the top of the inner container of this section. Value in pixels.

content_padding_bottom.label: Bottom Padding
content_padding_bottom.tooltip: Specify additional space at the bottom of the inner container of this section. Value in pixels.

content_padding_side.label: Side Padding
content_padding_side.tooltip:
- Use Default - use the default side padding (defined in Page > Inner Container > Side Padding).
- No Side Padding - remove side padding.
- Full Width - stretch the inner container of this section to full width and use the default side padding.
- Full Width, No Side Padding - stretch the inner container of this section to full width and remove side padding.

heading_appearance.label: Elements
heading_appearance.comment: Style of elements: Mini Cart drop-down, Mini Compare drop-down, account links.

line_height.label: Line Height
line_height.comment: Minimum height of line of text. It works similar to CSS property line-height.

padding_top.label: Top Padding
padding_top.comment: Specify additional gap above this section of the header. Value in pixels.

padding_bottom.label: Bottom Padding
padding_bottom.comment: Specify additional gap below this section of the header. Value in pixels.

content_padding_top.label: Top Padding
content_padding_top.tooltip: Specify additional space at the top of the inner container of this section. Value in pixels.

content_padding_bottom.label: Bottom Padding
content_padding_bottom.tooltip: Specify additional space at the bottom of the inner container of this section. Value in pixels.

content_padding_side.label: Side Padding
content_padding_side.tooltip:
- Use Default - use the default side padding (defined in Page > Inner Container > Side Padding).
- No Side Padding - remove side padding.
- Full Width - stretch the inner container of this section to full width and use the default side padding.
- Full Width, No Side Padding - stretch the inner container of this section to full width and remove side padding.

padding_top.label: Top Padding
padding_top.comment: Specify additional gap above this section of the header. Value in pixels.

padding_bottom.label: Bottom Padding
padding_bottom.comment: Specify additional gap below this section of the header. Value in pixels.

content_padding_side.label: Side Padding
content_padding_side.tooltip:
- Use Default - use the default side padding (defined in Page > Inner Container > Side Padding).
- No Side Padding - remove side padding.
- Full Width - stretch the inner container of this section to full width and use the default side padding.
- Full Width, No Side Padding - stretch the inner container of this section to full width and remove side padding.

heading_tabs.label: Mobile header tabs
heading_tabs.comment: Buttons (i.e. menu, search, account, cart) displayed in mobile header.

outer_bg_color.label: Background Color
outer_bg_color.comment: Background color of the entire menu container, as wide as the widht of the browser viewport.

padding_top.label: Top Padding
padding_top.comment: Specify additional gap above the menu bar. Value in pixels.

padding_bottom.label: Bottom Padding
padding_bottom.comment: Specify additional gap below the menu bar. Value in pixels.

inner_bg_color.label: Inner Background Color (Outline)
inner_bg_color.comment:
Background color of the inner container. Set this color to display an outline around the menu bar.
Note: if option Remove Content Side Padding is enabled, the outline will not be visible because menu bar will cover the inner container.

content_padding_top.label: Top Padding
content_padding_top.tooltip: Specify additional space at the top of the inner container of this section. Value in pixels.

content_padding_bottom.label: Bottom Padding
content_padding_bottom.tooltip: Specify additional space at the bottom of the inner container of this section. Value in pixels.

content_padding_side.label: Side Padding
content_padding_side.tooltip:
- Use Default - use the default side padding (defined in Page > Inner Container > Side Padding).
- No Side Padding - remove side padding.
- Full Width - stretch the inner container of this section to full width and use the default side padding.
- Full Width, No Side Padding - stretch the inner container of this section to full width and remove side padding.

line_height.label: Height
line_height.comment: Specify height of the top-level menu item.

border.label: Bottom Border Width
border.comment: Specify width of the border at the bottom of the menu bar. Leave empty to remove border.

sticky_border.label: Show Bottom Border
sticky_border.comment: If the border at the bottom of the menu bar was enabled, set this option to "No" to hide that border in the sticky menu.

level2_font_size.label: Drop-down Item Font Size
level2_font_size.comment: Font size of the menu items on all levels inside drop-downs.

heading_mega_dd_fonts.label: Mega Drop-Down - Font Settings
heading_mega_dd_fonts.comment: Additional font settings for menu items inside drop-downs configured as "Mega drop-down".

heading_mobile_dd_fonts.label: Mobile Menu - Font Settings
heading_mobile_dd_fonts.comment: Additional font settings for the mobile menu.

dropdown_shadow.label: Drop-down Shadow
dropdown_shadow.comment: If set to "Yes", drop-down boxes will drop shadow.

dropdown_border_top.label: Top Border Width
dropdown_border_top.comment: Specify width of the border at the top of the drop-down boxes. Leave empty to remove border.

dropdown_border_all_levels.label: Apply Border To All Levels
dropdown_border_all_levels.comment: If set to "No", only drop-down boxes of the top-level categories will have the border.

mobile_link_separator_color.label: Link Separator Color
mobile_link_separator_color.comment: Vertical space between links in mobile version of the main menu. Leave empty to remove separator.

mobile_shadow.label: Mobile Menu Drop-down Shadow
mobile_shadow.comment: If set to "Yes", mobile menu drop-down box will drop shadow if category contains any category blocks.

heading_vertical_items.label: Vertical Menu
heading_vertical_items.comment: Colors of: 1. the sidebar menu, 2. the top menu displayed as a vertical drop-down menu (when "Vertical Drop-down Menu" is enabled in menu settings).

vert_item_line_height.label: Height
vert_item_line_height.comment: Height of the top-level menu item.

heading_vertical_dropdown_menu.label: Top Menu - Vertical Drop-down Menu
heading_vertical_dropdown_menu.comment: The top menu displayed as a vertical drop-down menu (when "Vertical Drop-down Menu" option is enabled in menu settings).

vert_shadow.label: Display Shadow Of Vertical Drop-down Menu
vert_shadow.comment: If set to "Yes", the vertical drop-down will drop shadow. Note that this option does not affect the drop-down boxes of categories inside the menu.

main.label: Main
main.comment: In this tab, you can configure the main content area - section of the page located between the header and the footer.

padding_top.label: Top Padding
padding_top.comment: Specify additional gap above the main section of the page. Value in pixels.

padding_bottom.label: Bottom Padding
padding_bottom.comment: Specify additional gap below the main section of the page. Value in pixels.

content_padding_top.label: Top Padding
content_padding_top.tooltip: Specify additional space at the top of the inner container of this section. Value in pixels.

content_padding_bottom.label: Bottom Padding
content_padding_bottom.tooltip: Specify additional space at the bottom of the inner container of this section. Value in pixels.

content_padding_side.label: Side Padding
content_padding_side.tooltip:
- Use Default - use the default side padding (defined in Page > Inner Container > Side Padding).
- No Side Padding - remove side padding.
- Full Width - stretch the inner container of this section to full width and use the default side padding.
- Full Width, No Side Padding - stretch the inner container of this section to full width and remove side padding.

category.label: Category View
category.comment: In this tab, you can configure category view.

product_page.label: Product Page
product_page.comment: In this tab, you can configure the product page (in Magento also called "product view").

tab_border_color.label: Border Color
tab_border_color.comment: Boder color will be also used in accordion.

slideshow.label: Slideshow
slideshow.comment: In this tab, you can configure elements related to slideshows.

tool_icon_active_bg_color.label: Icon Active Background Color
tool_icon_active_bg_color.comment: Active pagination button. Note: not all styles of pagination use "active state" color.

footer.label: Footer
footer.comment: In this tab, you can configure the footer section of the page located at the bottom. Settings from this tab are inherited by all the other sub-sections of the footer. Some of the settings can be overridden in sub-sections.

padding_top.label: Top Padding
padding_top.comment: Specify additional gap above this section of the footer. Value in pixels.

padding_bottom.label: Bottom Padding
